replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
... 連這也要人翻譯啊???... 谷歌會哭的啊~~

先裝 MODLoader 以及 AudioMod (上面英文漏了這個)
1. 把"Add to jar"文件夾中的東西全丟進 minecraft.jar
2. 把"mod_Friend"文件夾丟到遊戲目錄".minecraft"
3. 打開並編輯 .minecraft\mod_Friend\FriendConfig.txt 改變朋友設置, 
    不然你就只能用遊戲原有的造型: Steve
4. 確定增加人物皮膚貼圖, 最好放進 minecraft.jar 的 mob 文件夾中
5. 玩遊戲... 

FriendConfig.txt 裡有一段
friend_texture=/mob/char.png
應該就是設置朋友皮膚, 也就是上頭第3及4步驟說的

http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... 4-presenting-wanda/
原帖有提供一些朋友設置文件及皮膚貼圖下載

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Save states (single-player only): Several slots are available for you to save your entire inventory and restore it later. (The "x" button next to a saved state will remove it.) This can be used to save your "real" inventory before editing, save a blank inventory to clear out everything you're holding, save a full inventory of materials, share inventories between characters, etc.

簡單說就是保存你的物品欄狀態, 可以快速切換不同內容的物品欄...

朋友MOD用法還是去看原帖說明吧... 再不然遊戲中按"H"也有線上說明... 簡單說就是跟NPC交朋友...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
... 你們怎麼都不看原帖說明啊????
... 再不然壓縮檔裡也有README.TXT的說明文件啊!!!!

Installation Instructions:-

MODLOADER NEEDED!

1. Add files from "Add to jar" To the minecraft.jar.
2. Add folder "mod_Friend" to folder ".minecraft" (the one /bin is in!).
3. Open folder "mod_Friend" (the one in .minecraft) and then edit "FriendConfig.txt" to your liking.
If you do not change the config your friend will be Minecraft's own: Steve.
4. Be sure to add the texture to the minecraft.jar(best putting it in the /mobs folder inside minecraft.jar).
5. Start Minecraft and have fun!
